attributes.action: Keep our Pollution levels down after lockdown
attributes.additional_details: We want you to keep it this way, in this period we have come to realisation of how important our health is. The World Health Organisation claims cities with higher pollution rates are seeing more deaths from COVID-19. You have been taking action on the coronavirus from the science, why not do the same with our Climate?
attributes.background: Air pollution levels in the UK have dropped significantly since the country went into lockdown. Greenhouse Gas emissions have dropped by 60% in the UK from last year. From this we are observing cleaner air, more wildlife and clearer skies. This is better for our health and our environment.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/317343
